message: Starting UI/UX design - analyzing existing system structure and requirements
Analyzed data structures and phase state machine. Creating comprehensive UI/UX design mockups and specifications for dashboard views

Completed comprehensive UI/UX design specification. Created detailed mockups for 3 main views (Dashboard, Task Detail, Agent Detail), defined component specifications, color schemes for 8-state phase machine, interaction patterns, and technical implementation notes. Document written to ui_design.md
